title: CryptoSuckerX
author: CryptoSuckerX
content: Selling my own stake.com account. -   Platinum VI.-   Progress: 93.82%.-   Verification Level: 2, Can do level 3 and 4 if it matters.-   Reason for selling: Quitting gambling, have to pay child support asap-   Currently daily bonus of $57 expiring 15/12/2023.Proposed Deal 1: Buy the account for $2,0001.   Will provide video proof. Pay $250.00 and take account.2.   Once account taken, pay $750 and I will provide email access. You can change passwords at this stage.3.   Once passwords changed, send another $500 and I will provide telegram access.4.   Once you have telegram, send another $500, and I will provide a copy of my ID, and selfie with ID. Proposed Deal 2: Wager for me $1,000 and later $2,000.1.   Will provide video proof. Pay $125.00 and take account.2.   Once account taken, pay $500 and I will provide email access. 3.   When at 99% wagering, send another $375.4.   Once at 100%, send $2,000. You will receive 12,800 on 100%.Telegram: CryptoSuckerXScreenshot: https://ibb.co/VLM1wzK
